newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Schroder confirms lodging stocks.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Schroder confirms lodging stocks.

text.p: -- Schroder Wertheim analyst John Rohs confirmed downgrading Marriott International Inc to outperform from outperform significantly and upgrading La Quinta Inns Inc to outperform significantly from outperform.
-- said Marriott was downgraded solely due to the stock price and added that business fundamentals remained solid.
-- on La Quinta, he said the company's plans to accelerate a program to refurnish its rooms was a good idea and would help boost profits as well as cash flow.
